attributes.action: Close down the coalition immediately following Nick Clegg's ABSOLUTE failure to present cogent arguments tonight.
attributes.additional_details: Nick Clegg is an ex MEP who receives a huge tax free pension from the EU conditional on his maintaining his support and NOT saying anything detrimental about the EU.  It was plainly obvious tonight that he has no conviction over the EU for the people of this country but he will fight to the death to keep his EU pension!
